person.persName: Burton M. Hunter (Trimble County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Hannah Moreland Hunter in Oldham County, Kentucky in December 1828. Father of Willis Hunter and E. Hunter. Married to Marena Ann Reno Hunter in Trimble County, Kentucky in September 1839. Father of Henry Hunter, Martha Hunter, Burton Hunter, James Hunter, Sarah Hunter, and Edmonia Hunter. Resident of Oldham County, Kentucky in 1830. Owned one enslaved person in Oldham County in 1830. Resident of Trimble County, Kentucky in 1840. Owned one enslaved person in Trimble County in 1840. Farmer in Trimble County in 1850. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.
